page.title: 09LEISURE TIME IN COEDPOETH
page.content: {Coedpoeth}is well provided for as regards recreation.It has a comprehensively stocked library which is open every weekday,a snooker hall which as situated above the library and is frequented by young and old alike and acts as a meeting place for the residents. Directly opposite the library is the park which comprises of a tennis court, a bowling green and some swings and slides for the kiddies.This area is well used during the summer months especially when the Coedpoeth Bowling Club has a league match. The village also has two or three football teams which compete in local League and cup matches.
